ygData.subject: Re: Limit on song memorization
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, not true.  Go rememorize Chant of Battle.  Now, start a new Bard, earn the money for the Chant, and memorize it.  Muuuuch slower when you first
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:30 PM 7/28/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: silky@...
>
>
>Well, for mages (yes I have an enchanter too - funny how they seem to fill
>the same slot in magic circles as we bards do) although I may have trouble
>deciding - it is INFINITELY easier to memorize spells, than songs.
>
>Since we never get meditiate - our songs mem as slowly as the day we get
>them - THAT is a problem.
>
>Besides the ONE song we have that DOES use manna, any reason they can't
>make our songs faster as we progress in skill?

Actually, not true. Go rememorize Chant of Battle. Now, start a new Bard,
earn the money for the Chant, and memorize it. Muuuuch slower when you
first get it.

We do speed up. Maybe not like the difference with Meditate, but it's
there all the same.

Talies the Wanderer
